lead_paragraph: KOBLICK--Joan Lesser. Died suddenly on February 6, 2016. Born NYC, March 28, 1932. Washington Irving high school '49; BFA Pratt Institute '53. Painter and printmaker, taught art and art history at University of Chicago Lab Schools for 31 years. Much loved and missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KOBLICK, JOAN LESSER

snippet: KOBLICK--Joan Lesser. Died suddenly on February 6, 2016. Born NYC, March 28, 1932. Washington Irving high school '49; BFA Pratt Institute '53. Painter and printmaker, taught art and art history at University of Chicago Lab Schools for 31 years. Much loved and missed. 1/3
